channel.title: CVE Feed for Rapid7 -- Metasploit Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rapid7 -- Metasploit Pro

item.title: CVE-2017-5235|2024-08-05T14:55:35.544Z -- rapid7 -- metasploit%20pro
item.description: Rapid7 Metasploit Pro installers prior to version 4.13.0-2017022101 contain a DLL preloading vulnerability, wherein it is possible for the installer to load a malicious DLL located in the current working directory of the installer.
